oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Old Dominion Barn Dance - Osborne Brothers - WRVA Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of an Old Dominion Barn Dance segment featuring the Osborne Brothers (performer), Benny Birchfield (performer), and Roberta Osborne (performer) on radio station WRVA (Radio Station : Richmond, Va.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Osborne Brothers; Benny Birchfield; Roberta Osborne
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- [Unidentified] introduces the Osborne Brothers -- My Saro Jane (Osborne Brothers) -- Bobby Osborne talks about the band and introduces members of the band -- Fair And Tender Ladies (Osborne Brothers) -- Bobby Osborne introduces Benny Birchfield to sing -- Head Over Heels In Love With You (Osborne Brothers) -- Bobby Osborne talks about Paul Craft and introduces the next song -- Bugle Call Rag (Osborne Brothers) -- Bobby Osborne introduces the next song -- Take This Hammer (Osborne Brothers) -- Bobby Osborne talks about past performances and record label changes -- Worried Man Blues (Osborne Brothers) -- Bobby Osborne talks about Virginia -- Give This Message To Your Heart (Osborne Brothers) -- Bobby Osborne introduces the next song -- Each Season Changes You (Osborne Brothers) -- Bobby Osborne introduces the next song -- Is This How A Broken Heart Dies (Osborne Brothers) (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WRVA (Radio station : Richmond, Va.); Osborne Brothers; Osborne, Bobby; Osborne, Sonny; Osborne, Roberta;
